Terms of Service

Last updated: October 12, 2023 • Version: 1.0

These Terms of Service govern your access to and use of the UK Locksmith Directory platform, which is owned and operated by Visible Solutions LLC.

By accessing, browsing, or using this Platform, you ("User," "you") acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must immediately cease using the Platform.

Note to UK Consumers

While these Terms are governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, nothing in these Terms is intended to limit any mandatory consumer rights you may have under the Consumer Rights Act 2015 or other applicable United Kingdom consumer protection legislation that cannot be contractually waived.

Table of Contents

1. Acceptance & Modifications

1.1 Binding Agreement

These Terms constitute a legally-binding agreement between you and Visible Solutions LLC.

1.2 Modifications

We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be announced by an update to the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page. Your continued use of the Platform after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

2. Nature of the Platform

2.1 Directory Service

The Platform acts solely as a technology provider and directory service that connects independent third-party locksmiths and security professionals ("Service Providers").

2.2 Not a Service Provider

Visible Solutions LLC is not a locksmith, security company, or contractor. We do not employ the Service Providers listed on the Platform, nor do we perform any security services ourselves. All contractual relationships formed for the provision of services are strictly between the User and the Service Provider.

2.3 No Agency

Nothing in these Terms creates an agency, partnership, joint venture, or employment relationship between Visible Solutions LLC and any Service Provider.

3. Acceptable Use Policy

You agree to use the Platform only for lawful purposes. You are strictly prohibited from:

  • Using the Platform to solicit Service Providers for employment outside the scope of locksmith services.
  • Engaging in any automated data collection, scraping, or indexing of the Platform's content without our express written consent.
  • Attempting to interfere with the proper functioning of the Platform's software or network infrastructure.
  • Submitting false reports, fraudulent reviews, or misleading information about Service Providers.
  • Harassing, threatening, or defaming any other user or Service Provider through the Platform.

4. Reviews & User Content

4.1 License

By submitting reviews, comments, or other content ("User Content") to the Platform, you grant Visible Solutions LLC a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, and fully sub-licensable right to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, and display such User Content throughout the world in any media.

4.2 Accuracy

You represent and warrant that your User Content is accurate, honest, and based on your genuine experience with a Service Provider. We strictly prohibit the posting of reviews by competitors, affiliates, or third parties.

4.3 Moderation

We reserve the right, but have no obligation, to monitor, edit, or remove User Content that we determine in our sole discretion violates these Terms or is otherwise objectionable.

5. Disclaimers & Limitation of Liability

Important Notice Regarding Liability

Visible Solutions LLC does not guarantee the quality, skill, or aspects of the services provided by independent locksmiths. We are not a party to any transaction between you and a Service Provider.

5.1 "As Is" Basis

The Platform constitutes an "as is" and "as available" service. We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, regarding the accuracy of Service Provider listings, pricing, or availability.

5.2 Service Performance

Visible Solutions LLC shall not be liable for any damages, direct or indirect, arising from the acts, omissions, errors, misrepresentations, warranties, breaches, or negligence of any Service Provider or for any personal injuries, death, property damage, or other damages or expenses resulting there from.

5.3 Cap on Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall the aggregate liability of Visible Solutions LLC exceeding the greater of (a) the amount you paid to Visible Solutions LLC in the 12 months prior to the action giving rise to liability, or (b) $100.00 USD.

6. Intellectual Property

All content included on the Platform, such as text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Visible Solutions LLC or its content suppliers and is protected by United States and international copyright laws.

7. Governing Law & Jurisdiction

7.1 Jurisdiction

These Terms and any disputes related to them or the Platform shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Delaware, United States, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

7.2 Dispute Resolution

You agree that any legal action or proceeding between Visible Solutions LLC and you for any purpose concerning these Terms or the parties' obligations hereunder shall be brought exclusively in a federal or state court of competent jurisdiction sitting in Delaware.

If you have any questions regarding these Terms or need to report a violation, please contact:
